pages.title: Demon's Dream
pages.text: Demon's dream is a herb that gives humans the $(thing)Third Eye$(), as well as the ability to interact with $(thing)Otherworld$() materials. Seeds can be found like wheat seeds, by breaking grass. Consuming the grown fruit activates the ability.

An additional side effect of demon's dream, that other ways to obtain the $(thing)Third Eye$() do not bring, is the ability to interact with $(thing)Otherworld$() materials. While under the effect of demon's dream you are able to harvest Otherstone as well as Otherworld trees.
The consumption of demon's dream allows to see parts of $(thing)The Other Place$() that intersect with our plane of existence.
